product_name: Earth The Pass Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 6"
long_description: This versatile paddle board lends itself to all-purpose flatwater cruising with outstanding stability for the new paddler, and delivers excellent performance in surf for the experienced paddler.
short_description: This versatile paddle board lends itself to all-purpose flatwater cruising with outstanding stability for the new paddler, and delivers excellent performance in surf for the experienced paddler.
